lead_paragraph: The New York state attorney general filed a $40 million lawsuit on Saturday against Donald Trump's for-profit investment school, Trump University, accusing it of engaging in illegal business practices, according to the New York Times.

headline.main: Donald Trump Investment School Sued by New York Attorney General: Report
headline.print_headline: Donald Trump Investment School Sued by New York Attorney General: Report

snippet: The New York state attorney general filed a $40 million lawsuit on Saturday against Donald Trump's for-profit investment school, Trump University, accusing it of engaging in illegal business practices, according to the New York Times....
